document_data.name: ''Aiedo Wither-Stick''
document_data.creator: [[Meng Aiedo]]
document_data.mainbody: '''''Aiedo wither-sticks''''' were [[enchanted]] [[reed]] [[staves]] from the southern land of the [[Shaar]].
document_data.Powers: Aiedo's reed staves possessed a ''+1'' enchantment and had a good chance of affecting the target's strength upon a successful strike, making them noticeably weaker and frail.
document_data.History:
[[Meng Aiedo]], a weapon maker renowned for his work with various tall grasses and [[bamboo]] of [[Kara-Tur]], discovered a sturdy species of reed in the [[Lhespenbog]]'s reed-fields in the [[Eastern Shaar]]. From those plants, Aiedo started crafting the so-called ''Aiedo wither-sticks''.

By the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]], Aiedo's reed weapons found their way to the [[Sword Coast]] region and eventually fell into the hands of [[quarterstaff]] users in the city of [[Neverwinter]].
